title: Lindsey Vonn: American skier has third surgery after Winter Olympics crash
description: Lindsey Vonn says she is "making progress" after having a successful third surgery on the broken leg she sustained in a crash at the Winter Olympics on Sunday.
content:
Lindsey Vonn says she is "making progress" after having a successful third surgery on the broken leg she sustained in a crash at the Winter Olympics on Sunday.
The American great was racing just nine days after rupturing ligaments in her left knee wh... [1561 chars]

title: Boy arrested over double stabbing at Kingsbury High School in London is former pupil, police say
description: Two boys, aged 12 and 13, were taken to hospital in a serious condition after the incident.
content:
A 13-year-old boy suspected of stabbing two boys at a secondary school is a former pupil, police have confirmed.
He was arrested after being seen at a mosque, they added.
Police believe the attack began when the teenager, a British national, went int... [1797 chars]

title: Revealed: Spurs paid £6.7m to bring Thomas Frank and his staff from Brentford
description: Tottenham paid Brentford £6.7m in compensation to secure the services of Thomas Frank last summer
content:
Tottenham paid Brentford £6.7m in compensation to secure the services of Thomas Frank last summer. The head coach was sacked on Wednesday morning, eight months later.
Confirmation that Tottenham paid such a large fee for Frank was revealed in Brentfo... [1524 chars]

title: Fifa World Cup: ICE will be 'key part of security' in US
description: The acting head of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) has told a congressional committee that the agency is "a key part of the overall security apparatus for the World Cup" when asked if he would pause operations for this summer's tournament.

title: The Pogues drummer Andrew Ranken dead at 72
description: In a statement published online the band said Ranken was the "heartbeat of The Pogues".
content:
ByAuryn Cox
BBC News NI
Published
3 hours ago
The Pogues drummer Andrew Ranken has died aged 72, the band has announced.
Ranken was a founding member of the London-based music group and played in some of the band's best-known songs such as Fairytale ... [1294 chars]
